thread.title_full: Great Location for exploring London - Review of Hotel ibis budget London Whitechapel - Brick Lane, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Fran S
title: Great Location for exploring London -
text:
Ideally situated close to the tubes at Whitechapel, Aldgate East and Aldgate this is a great base for exploring London. Always welcoming staff and the refurbished lounge and breakfast areas are comfortable. I love the IBIS beds and the rooms are adequate for a short stay (missed the kettle though so buy something to drink when you wake up). Don't forget to explore the pubs and excellent cafe/restaurants in the area.
Room Tip: Ask for a spare pillow as they are a bit on the thin side and remember to buy something to drink for... See more room tips
